title: alli malarndadammA
sahitya:
alli malarndadammA ennai andi vandazhaittadammA


anupallavi

  mullaiyum tenralum mOhana vAnilE muzhu mati nilavilE muttamittADudammA


caraNam    nakSattira maNi inda nAyaka shaktiyin nAda vINai vandu kAdinaik-konjudammA
aTSara brahmattin atishaya ulagilE AduvOm Anandam pADuvOm sakhigaLA
